channel.title: Best place to train str?
channel.description: umm ok guys..im on my pure(1def for ppl who don't know what pures are LOL) im 50att 66str 31pray..where is fastest exp and requires not alot of cash/food?

item.title: Best place to train str?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

ß Boring ß:

Eh, I need an opinion on my pure. Right now hes 69 cb, I got 20 def for initiate, 60 att, 82 str, 34 pray. Am I doing good so far -.-

No. You got 20 defense, it’s not a pure anymore, dumbass.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Tr3v0r, post:21, topic:117567”][quote author=pko link=topic=166842.msg1552940#msg1552940 date=1183061723]
Did something fucking happen to pest control? or is something wrong?

because, thats good exp. I say get 98 range for the hp, and 99 strength at pest.
[/quote]

Yah, But low LVL pure’s can’t go there. You gota be lvl 40+ CMB. IDK what the CMB LVL for this guy is though.[/quote] im 56cb…

item.title: Best place to train str?
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

40 combat is nothing… 40 attack 40 strength 31 prayer… and like 40 hp… isnt that around 40 combat? do waterfall, vampire slayer, restless ghost, and priest in peril. Right there, you have like 33 combat. Just get the rest at like al kharid guards or varrock well.

Read full topic

item.title: Best place to train str?
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

Pure = 1 def and 1 pray.

I would train either in S-Stronghold, or rock crabs, depends if your F2P or P2P.

item.title: Best place to train str?
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quotw]Yes, I hate safers too. In members, one of the best pkin weapons is the Granite Maul, SLIGHTLY slower than the r2h, but you can do 2 special attacks so it hits 2 times instantly, with only say 80 str, prayer and perhaps a super str pot, you can hit a normal 25+, do double spec and have 3 bubbles all 25+ in damage, instant KO to all noob pures. With a basic 60, 80, 40 and 70 hp, 31 prayer, you’ll only be combat 76, but then really, what is full black dhide and 90 range going to do to stop a 75 attack?
[/quote]
a tank behind the blk dhide. but yeah whats up with the blk dhide legs, throw that out the window and get a pair of rune legs m8

Read full topic

item.title: Best place to train str?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]Calling someone a safer is pretty much whining that they didn’t make it easy for you to kill them.

Meh.
It can be pretty clear sometime if you’re just chilling in W3 edgeville level one wildy and you get into a fight with a pure your same level and this guy just tends to eat a fucking extra swordfish or three every time he eats (which also happens to be at around 26-30 HP so you have fucking max out with a R2H+pot+pray to KO) that some people play it way too safe and the only way they get kills while playing like that is from credited kills that they don’t actually KO. Anyway, I agree that whining about it is annoying but mad people should take more risks. At everything.

Everything in moderation, especially moderation.[/quote]

Yes, I hate safers too. In members, one of the best pkin weapons is the Granite Maul, SLIGHTLY slower than the r2h, but you can do 2 special attacks so it hits 2 times instantly, with only say 80 str, prayer and perhaps a super str pot, you can hit a normal 25+, do double spec and have 3 bubbles all 25+ in damage, instant KO to all noob pures. With a basic 60, 80, 40 and 70 hp, 31 prayer, you’ll only be combat 76, but then really, what is full black dhide and 90 range going to do to stop a 75 attack?

Read full topic

item.title: Best place to train str?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Calling someone a safer is pretty much whining that they didn't make it easy for you to kill them.

Meh.
It can be pretty clear sometime if you’re just chilling in W3 edgeville level one wildy and you get into a fight with a pure your same level and this guy just tends to eat a fucking extra swordfish or three every time he eats (which also happens to be at around 26-30 HP so you have fucking max out with a R2H+pot+pray to KO) that some people play it way too safe and the only way they get kills while playing like that is from credited kills that they don’t actually KO. Anyway, I agree that whining about it is annoying but mad people should take more risks. At everything.

Everything in moderation, especially moderation.

Read full topic

@MsnRocks wrote:

Thats mostly for lower lvls around 30 thru 50, i think hes lyk lvl 60? i’m not sure though. get em low since its p2p, use rune knives, and if you get em low to about 30 hp, switch to dds, boom! spec that bitch. remember to turn prayer on if u have… and super pot.

u can even do P2p, because hardly anyone goes, fast XP.

item.title: Best place to train str?
item.dc:creator: @i_ancients_i i ancients i
item.description:
@i_ancients_i wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:4, topic:117567”]I got my pure from 40 60 1 to 40 77 1 at the flesh crawlers, and I only played for a few minutes out of that really…One of the reasons I quit Runescape PKing (apart from the fact it’s fucking boring and shit…eh, it’s too fucking easy to train str now, too many insane pures) a couple hundred lobs a few anchovy pizzas and a couple dozen strength potions. Just using normal or shitty food and no pots it’s still insanely fast. They only hit ones and give 100xp each. They autoattack. Only problem is it’s a hike…but bring good foood and it’s close to the monastary so whatever.

Oh yeah, you say you lost interest at the RC? FC drop some cool stuff sometimes (gems, runes, etc…) so if you dig you can pick up. Plenty of people around and shit to do anyway, or just watch TV or whatever.[/quote] Fc?

Read full topic

item.title: Best place to train str?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I got my pure from 40 60 1 to 40 77 1 at the flesh crawlers, and I only played for a few minutes out of that really…One of the reasons I quit Runescape PKing (apart from the fact it’s fucking boring and shit…eh, it’s too fucking easy to train str now, too many insane pures) a couple hundred lobs a few anchovy pizzas and a couple dozen strength potions. Just using normal or shitty food and no pots it’s still insanely fast. They only hit ones and give 100xp each. They autoattack. Only problem is it’s a hike…but bring good foood and it’s close to the monastary so whatever.

Oh yeah, you say you lost interest at the RC? FC drop some cool stuff sometimes (gems, runes, etc…) so if you dig you can pick up. Plenty of people around and shit to do anyway, or just watch TV or whatever.

Read full topic
